task.title: Purchasing Items from Separate Business Groups
task.abstract: Use the Transfers Payable Account and Transfers Receivable Account fields on the Business Group record to ensure funds are directed to the appropriate business groups and the resulting transactions. The payments are allocated when a customer purchases items from different business groups via a single sales order.

ul.li: Configure two business groups: business group 1 with Transfers Payable Account, business group 2 with Transfers Receivable Account
Each business group must have an item

step.cmd: Navigate to the Sales Orders tab in the eBusiness app and click the New button.
Select the Contact, Posting Entity, and Schedule Type. Click Save.
Select the membership item from Business Group 1 and add it to the cart. Select the donation item from Business Group 2 and add it to the cart. Complete the payment.

taskbody.result:
Successfully creating a sales order results in...
a Sales Order Line for each purchased item.
the Receipt record generated from the Receipt Lines.
two Transaction Summaries.
two sets of Transaction Lines.
